video_prompt: Pink lotus petals softly unfurl, revealing yellow centers. Green lotus leaves slowly undulate, their golden veins subtly shimmering. Thin green reeds gently sway. A lotus bud gradually opens.
image_prompt: **High-quality watercolor illustration in traditional East Asian style: Vibrant lotus flowers (white to magenta gradient, yellow centers) and diverse green lotus leaves with gilded veins and gold flecks, surrounded by green reeds, against a light beige background. Features a lotus bud in the upper right.**
refined_video_prompt: Pink lotus petals delicately peel open, gradually revealing vibrant yellow centers. Green lotus leaves fluidly ripple, their golden veins glinting as light shifts. Thin green reeds continually sway. A lotus bud steadily expands, its layers separating to unveil the forming bloom.
